message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,200,000. This is a great deal considering its value to me. Let me know your thoughts.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of your product, but I am only able to offer $950,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $950,000 is still a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $1,050,000, considering the value of the product. This is a fair compromise that allows both of us to benefit. Let's see if we can make this work.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate the effort. I would like to counter with an offer of $1,000,000. This seems to be closer to the midpoint of our previous offers, and I believe it would be beneficial for both parties.
